name: QuestBid
overview: No Ads, no search, let the providers compete for your business! QuestBid is an innovative approach for consumers finding local business. Just post a text request online and sit back relax; QuestBid does the hard work. It finds the qualified business providers in real time and look up their phone number. The magic comes when QuestBid makes phone call to the providers and invite them to bid. Through this unique voice inquiry mechanism, QuestBid ensures any valid request will receive timely responses. The voice inquiry method also provides an automatic provider acquiring mechanism to sustain growth to meet the typical size threshold requirement for a marketplace to be viable. QuestBid is set to build the online and offline(via phone) marketplace for service providers.
